object.name: Blue Coin (SM64 Style)
object.notes: A blue coin that gives you 5 coins and fully heals the player when collected.

field.name: Inside Bubble?
field.notes: If true, the Blue Coin will be placed inside an Air Bubble.

field.name: Connect to moving objects?
field.notes: Blue Coin clipping may break with this option.

object.name: Remove Power-Up Area
object.notes: !!! DOESNT EXIST !!! A better version of MorphPlayerLimitArea that removes your power-up when you enter the area.

object.name: Completed Scenario Controller
object.notes: !!! DOESNT EXIST !!! Activates its SW_A when the specified Power Star is completed

object.name: Power-Up Switch
object.notes: Activates its SW_A when the specified Power Star is completed. Use SW_B to deactivate the object.

field.name: Power-Up
field.notes: 0 = Bee Mario, 1 = Boo Mario, 2 = Cloud Mario, 3 = Flying Mario, 4 = Fire Mario, 5 = Ice Mario, 6 = Rainbow Mario, 7 = Rock Mario, 8 = Spring Mario, 9 = Yoshi

field.name: Stay activated ?
field.notes: Set to 0 to turn off SW_A after exiting a power-up

field.name: Switch during action ?
field.notes: Set to 0 to check for a specific action (NOT IMPLEMENTED YET)

object.name: 99-Up Cake
object.notes: A 99-Up Cake. Works best at 0.1 scale. Kind of a joke object.

object.name: Remote Morph Remover
object.notes: !!! DOESNT EXIST !!! Removes Mario's current Power-Up or a specified Power-Up. Use SW_B.

field.name: Power-Up
field.notes: 0 = Bee Mario, 1 = Boo Mario, 2 = Cloud Mario, 3 = Flying Mario, 4 = Fire Mario, 5 = Ice Mario, 6 = Rainbow Mario, 7 = Rock Mario, 8 = Spring Mario, 9 = Yoshi

object.name: Morph-Changing Area
object.notes: !!! DOESNT EXIST !!! Changes Mario to the specified power-up when the area is entered.

field.name: Power-Up
field.notes: 0 = Bee Mario, 1 = Boo Mario, 2 = Cloud Mario, 3 = Flying Mario, 4 = Fire Mario, 5 = Ice Mario, 6 = Rainbow Mario, 7 = Rock Mario, 8 = Spring Mario, 9 = Yoshi

object.name: Remote Morph Changer
object.notes: !!! DOESNT EXIST !!! Changes Mario to the specified power-up when SW_B is activated.

field.name: Power-Up
field.notes: 0 = Bee Mario, 1 = Boo Mario, 2 = Cloud Mario, 3 = Flying Mario, 4 = Fire Mario, 5 = Ice Mario, 6 = Rainbow Mario, 7 = Rock Mario, 8 = Spring Mario, 9 = Yoshi
